title: Derive the Lukasiewicz axioms from the Russell-Bernays Axioms

blocks.name: rb-bijust
blocks.content: Justification for ~ rb-imdf . (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 17-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: rb-imdf
blocks.content: The definition of implication, in terms of ` \/ ` and ` -. ` . (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 17-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: anmp
blocks.content: Modus ponens for ` \/ ` ` -. ` axiom systems. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 12-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: rb-ax1
blocks.content: The first of four axioms in the Russell-Bernays axiom system. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 13-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: rb-ax2
blocks.content: The second of four axioms in the Russell-Bernays axiom system. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 13-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: rb-ax3
blocks.content: The third of four axioms in the Russell-Bernays axiom system. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 13-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: rb-ax4
blocks.content: The fourth of four axioms in the Russell-Bernays axiom system. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 13-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: rbsyl
blocks.content: Used to rederive the Lukasiewicz axioms from Russell-Bernays'. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 18-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: rblem1
blocks.content: Used to rederive the Lukasiewicz axioms from Russell-Bernays'. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 18-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm rblem1(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  |- wo(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(w2, w3))
  -| wo(wn(w0), w2)
  -| wo(wn(w1), w3)
} = {
  rbsyl(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(w2, w3), wo(w2, w1))
  anmp(wo(wn(wo(w2, w1)), wo(w2, w3)), wo(wn(w1), w3))
  rb-ax1(w1, w3, w2)
  rbsyl(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(w2, w1), wo(w1, w2))
  rb-ax2(w1, w2)
  rbsyl(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(w1, w2), wo(w1, w0))
  anmp(wo(wn(wo(w1, w0)), wo(w1, w2)), wo(wn(w0), w2))
  rb-ax1(w0, w2, w1)
  rb-ax2(w0, w1)
}

blocks.name: rblem2
blocks.content: Used to rederive the Lukasiewicz axioms from Russell-Bernays'. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 18-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: rblem3
blocks.content: Used to rederive the Lukasiewicz axioms from Russell-Bernays'. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 18-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: rblem4
blocks.content: Used to rederive the Lukasiewicz axioms from Russell-Bernays'. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 18-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm rblem4(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4, wff w5) {
  |- wo(wn(wo(wo(w0, w1), w2)), wo(wo(w3, w4), w5))
  -| wo(wn(w0), w5)
  -| wo(wn(w1), w4)
  -| wo(wn(w2), w3)
} = {
  rbsyl(wn(wo(wo(w0, w1), w2)), wo(wo(w3, w4), w5), wo(wo(w2, w1), w0))
  rblem1(wo(w2, w1), w0, wo(w3, w4), w5)
  rblem1(w2, w1, w3, w4)
  rbsyl(wn(wo(wo(w0, w1), w2)), wo(wo(w2, w1), w0), wo(wo(w1, w2), w0))
  rbsyl(wn(wo(wo(w1, w2), w0)), wo(wo(w2, w1), w0), wo(w0, wo(w2, w1)))
  rb-ax2(w0, wo(w2, w1))
  rbsyl(wn(wo(wo(w1, w2), w0)), wo(w0, wo(w2, w1)), wo(w0, wo(w1, w2)))
  anmp(wo(wn(wo(w0, wo(w1, w2))), wo(w0, wo(w2, w1))), wo(wn(wo(w1, w2)), wo(w2, w1)))
  rb-ax2(w1, w2)
  rb-ax1(wo(w1, w2), wo(w2, w1), w0)
  rb-ax2(wo(w1, w2), w0)
  rbsyl(wn(wo(wo(w0, w1), w2)), wo(wo(w1, w2), w0), wo(wo(wo(w1, w2), w0), wo(wo(w1, w2), w0)))
  rb-ax4(wo(wo(w1, w2), w0))
  rblem1(wo(w0, w1), w2, wo(wo(w1, w2), w0), wo(wo(w1, w2), w0))
  rbsyl(wn(wo(w0, w1)), wo(wo(w1, w2), w0), wo(w0, wo(w1, w2)))
  rb-ax2(w0, wo(w1, w2))
  rblem2(w0, w1, w2)
  anmp(wo(wn(w2), wo(wo(w1, w2), w0)), wo(wn(w2), wo(w1, w2)))
  rb-ax3(w2, w1)
  rblem2(wn(w2), wo(w1, w2), w0)
}

blocks.name: rblem5
blocks.content: Used to rederive the Lukasiewicz axioms from Russell-Bernays'. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 19-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm rblem5(wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wo(wn(wo(wn(wn(w0)), w1)), wo(wn(wn(w1)), w0))
} = {
  rbsyl(wn(wo(wn(wn(w0)), w1)), wo(wn(wn(w1)), w0), wo(w0, wn(wn(w1))))
  rb-ax2(w0, wn(wn(w1)))
  rblem1(wn(wn(w0)), w1, w0, wn(wn(w1)))
  anmp(wo(wn(wn(wn(w0))), w0), wo(wn(w0), w0))
  rblem1(wn(w0), w0, wn(wn(wn(w0))), w0)
  anmp(wo(wn(wn(w0)), wn(wn(wn(w0)))), wo(wn(wn(wn(w0))), wn(wn(w0))))
  rbsyl(wn(wn(wn(w0))), wn(wn(w0)), wo(wn(wn(w0)), wn(wn(w0))))
  rb-ax4(wn(wn(w0)))
  rb-ax3(wn(wn(w0)), wn(wn(w0)))
  rb-ax2(wn(wn(wn(w0))), wn(wn(w0)))
  rbsyl(wn(w0), w0, wo(w0, w0))
  rb-ax4(w0)
  rb-ax3(w0, w0)
  anmp(wo(wn(w1), wn(wn(w1))), wo(wn(wn(w1)), wn(w1)))
  rbsyl(wn(wn(w1)), wn(w1), wo(wn(w1), wn(w1)))
  rb-ax4(wn(w1))
  rb-ax3(wn(w1), wn(w1))
  rb-ax2(wn(wn(w1)), wn(w1))
}

blocks.name: rblem6
blocks.content: Used to rederive the Lukasiewicz axioms from Russell-Bernays'. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 19-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm rblem6(wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wo(wn(w0), w1)
  -| wn(wo(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wn(wo(wn(w1), w0))))
} = {
  anmp(wo(wn(w0), w1), wn(wo(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wn(wo(wn(w1), w0)))))
  anmp(wo(wn(wn(wo(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wn(wo(wn(w1), w0))))), wo(wn(w0), w1)), wo(wn(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1))), wo(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wn(wo(wn(w1), w0)))))
  anmp(wo(wn(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1))), wo(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wn(wo(wn(w1), w0)))), wo(wo(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wn(wo(wn(w1), w0))), wn(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)))))
  anmp(wo(wo(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wn(wo(wn(w1), w0))), wn(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)))), wo(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wn(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)))))
  anmp(wo(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wn(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)))), wo(wn(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1))), wn(wo(wn(w0), w1))))
  rbsyl(wn(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1))), wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wo(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wn(wo(wn(w0), w1))))
  rb-ax4(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)))
  rb-ax3(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)))
  rb-ax2(wn(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1))), wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)))
  rblem3(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wn(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1))), wn(wo(wn(w1), w0)))
  rb-ax2(wo(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wn(wo(wn(w1), w0))), wn(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1))))
  rblem5(wo(wn(w0), w1), wo(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wn(wo(wn(w1), w0))))
}

blocks.name: rblem7
blocks.content: Used to rederive the Lukasiewicz axioms from Russell-Bernays'. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 19-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: re1axmp
blocks.content: ~ ax-mp derived from Russell-Bernays'. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 19-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: re2luk1
blocks.content: ~ luk-1 derived from Russell-Bernays'. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 19-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm re2luk1(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2)))
} = {
  anmp(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2))), wo(wn(wi(w0, w1)), wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2))))
  rbsyl(wn(wi(w0, w1)), wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2)), wo(wn(wi(w1, w2)), wi(w0, w2)))
  rblem7(wo(wn(wi(w1, w2)), wi(w0, w2)), wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2)))
  rb-imdf(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2))
  rbsyl(wn(wi(w0, w1)), wo(wn(wi(w1, w2)), wi(w0, w2)), wo(wn(w0), w1))
  rbsyl(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wo(wn(wi(w1, w2)), wi(w0, w2)), wo(wn(wo(wn(w1), w2)), wo(wn(w0), w2)))
  rblem1(wn(wo(wn(w1), w2)), wo(wn(w0), w2), wn(wi(w1, w2)), wi(w0, w2))
  anmp(wo(wn(wn(wo(wn(w1), w2))), wn(wi(w1, w2))), wo(wn(wi(w1, w2)), wo(wn(w1), w2)))
  rblem6(wi(w1, w2), wo(wn(w1), w2))
  rb-imdf(w1, w2)
  rbsyl(wn(wo(wn(wi(w1, w2)), wo(wn(w1), w2))), wo(wn(wn(wo(wn(w1), w2))), wn(wi(w1, w2))), wo(wn(wi(w1, w2)), wn(wn(wo(wn(w1), w2)))))
  rb-ax2(wn(wi(w1, w2)), wn(wn(wo(wn(w1), w2))))
  rblem1(wn(wi(w1, w2)), wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wi(w1, w2)), wn(wn(wo(wn(w1), w2))))
  rbsyl(wn(wn(wi(w1, w2))), wn(wi(w1, w2)), wo(wn(wi(w1, w2)), wn(wi(w1, w2))))
  rb-ax4(wn(wi(w1, w2)))
  rb-ax3(wn(wi(w1, w2)), wn(wi(w1, w2)))
  anmp(wo(wn(wo(wn(w1), w2)), wn(wn(wo(wn(w1), w2)))), wo(wn(wn(wo(wn(w1), w2))), wn(wo(wn(w1), w2))))
  rb-ax2(wn(wn(wo(wn(w1), w2))), wn(wo(wn(w1), w2)))
  rblem7(wo(wn(w0), w2), wi(w0, w2))
  rb-imdf(w0, w2)
  anmp(wo(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wo(wn(wo(wn(w1), w2)), wo(wn(w0), w2))), wo(wn(wo(wn(w1), w2)), wo(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wo(wn(w0), w2))))
  rb-ax1(w1, w2, wn(w0))
  rbsyl(wn(wo(wn(wo(wn(w1), w2)), wo(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wo(wn(w0), w2)))), wo(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wo(wn(wo(wn(w1), w2)), wo(wn(w0), w2))), wo(wo(wn(wo(wn(w1), w2)), wo(wn(w0), w2)), wn(wo(wn(w0), w1))))
  rb-ax2(wo(wn(wo(wn(w1), w2)), wo(wn(w0), w2)), wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)))
  rbsyl(wn(wo(wn(wo(wn(w1), w2)), wo(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wo(wn(w0), w2)))), wo(wo(wn(wo(wn(w1), w2)), wo(wn(w0), w2)), wn(wo(wn(w0), w1))), wo(wo(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wo(wn(w0), w2)), wn(wo(wn(w1), w2))))
  rblem4(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wo(wn(w0), w2), wn(wo(wn(w1), w2)), wn(wo(wn(w1), w2)), wo(wn(w0), w2), wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)))
  rbsyl(wn(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1))), wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wo(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wn(wo(wn(w0), w1))))
  rb-ax4(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)))
  rb-ax3(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)))
  rbsyl(wn(wo(wn(w0), w2)), wo(wn(w0), w2), wo(wo(wn(w0), w2), wo(wn(w0), w2)))
  rb-ax4(wo(wn(w0), w2))
  rb-ax3(wo(wn(w0), w2), wo(wn(w0), w2))
  rbsyl(wn(wn(wo(wn(w1), w2))), wn(wo(wn(w1), w2)), wo(wn(wo(wn(w1), w2)), wn(wo(wn(w1), w2))))
  rb-ax4(wn(wo(wn(w1), w2)))
  rb-ax3(wn(wo(wn(w1), w2)), wn(wo(wn(w1), w2)))
  rb-ax2(wn(wo(wn(w1), w2)), wo(wn(wo(wn(w0), w1)), wo(wn(w0), w2)))
  rblem6(wi(w0, w1), wo(wn(w0), w1))
  rb-imdf(w0, w1)
  rblem7(wo(wn(wi(w0, w1)), wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2))), wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2))))
  rb-imdf(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2)))
}

blocks.name: re2luk2
blocks.content: ~ luk-2 derived from Russell-Bernays'. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 19-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm re2luk2(wff w0) {
  |- wi(wi(wn(w0), w0), w0)
} = {
  anmp(wi(wi(wn(w0), w0), w0), wo(wn(wi(wn(w0), w0)), w0))
  rbsyl(wn(wi(wn(w0), w0)), w0, wo(wn(wn(w0)), w0))
  rbsyl(wn(wo(wn(wn(w0)), w0)), w0, wo(w0, w0))
  rblem1(wn(wn(w0)), w0, w0, w0)
  anmp(wo(wn(wn(wn(w0))), w0), wo(wn(w0), w0))
  rblem1(wn(w0), w0, wn(wn(wn(w0))), w0)
  anmp(wo(wn(wn(w0)), wn(wn(wn(w0)))), wo(wn(wn(wn(w0))), wn(wn(w0))))
  rbsyl(wn(wn(wn(w0))), wn(wn(w0)), wo(wn(wn(w0)), wn(wn(w0))))
  rb-ax4(wn(wn(w0)))
  rb-ax3(wn(wn(w0)), wn(wn(w0)))
  rb-ax2(wn(wn(wn(w0))), wn(wn(w0)))
  rbsyl(wn(w0), w0, wo(w0, w0))
  rb-ax4(w0)
  rb-ax3(w0, w0)
  rblem6(wi(wn(w0), w0), wo(wn(wn(w0)), w0))
  rb-imdf(wn(w0), w0)
  rblem7(wo(wn(wi(wn(w0), w0)), w0), wi(wi(wn(w0), w0), w0))
  rb-imdf(wi(wn(w0), w0), w0)
}

blocks.name: re2luk3
blocks.content: ~ luk-3 derived from Russell-Bernays'. This theorem, along with ~ re1axmp , ~ re2luk1 , and ~ re2luk2 shows that ~ rb-ax1 , ~ rb-ax2 , ~ rb-ax3 , and ~ rb-ax4 , along with ~ anmp , can be used as a complete axiomatization of propositional calculus. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 19-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm re2luk3(wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wn(w0), w1))
} = {
  anmp(wi(w0, wi(wn(w0), w1)), wo(wn(w0), wi(wn(w0), w1)))
  rbsyl(wn(w0), wi(wn(w0), w1), wo(wn(wn(w0)), w1))
  rblem7(wo(wn(wn(w0)), w1), wi(wn(w0), w1))
  rb-imdf(wn(w0), w1)
  anmp(wo(wn(w0), wo(wn(wn(w0)), w1)), wo(wn(w0), wn(wn(w0))))
  anmp(wo(wn(w0), wn(wn(w0))), wo(wn(wn(w0)), wn(w0)))
  rbsyl(wn(wn(w0)), wn(w0), wo(wn(w0), wn(w0)))
  rb-ax4(wn(w0))
  rb-ax3(wn(w0), wn(w0))
  rb-ax2(wn(wn(w0)), wn(w0))
  rblem2(wn(w0), wn(wn(w0)), w1)
  rblem7(wo(wn(w0), wi(wn(w0), w1)), wi(w0, wi(wn(w0), w1)))
  rb-imdf(w0, wi(wn(w0), w1))
}
